text: President Carter said in on this very
site uh that he thinks America is ready
for um for a gay president um polls have
shown that there was a Vanity Fair CBS
poll that showed over 50% of the public
supports the concept of an openly gay
president we've certainly you know
emerged as a as a political force in
this country um uh you're seeing a lot
of um attenion to the issues we just
passed don't don't tell repeal and so I
think the timing is absolutely perfect I
think the fact that I am an outsider
that that I've been in the political
process for over 30 years I've worked on
nine presidential campaigns I've been a
very high level at three I think I think
that shows the the public is is ready
and and my experience um particularly on
the political side of things but as a
Washington Outsider I think would be
unique and be
welcome I'm not so sure how how some of
the the far rightwing people will react
to my candidacy I'm I'm considering
myself an independent Republican um I'm
I'm more Progressive particularly on
some of the social issues than than
anybody else uh considering running uh
so there might be some opposition um I
actually faced my first um bit of um
hatred um when I was in Iowa in May I
had had reception there uh as I've done
in in New Hampshire many times this was
my my first in Iowa um after that um the
Republican National committeeman a man
named Steve Sheffer also happens to be
president of the Iowa Christian Alliance
sent me a a very tur threatening email
and it said you and the radical homeless
sexual Community are not welcome in Iowa
and as a matter of fact I will work
overtime and interesting choice of words
to abort your candidacy well you know
this is from the number two ranking
Republican in the state of Iowa and and
and I I turned that over the De Moine
register and and it became a huge news
story there and a lot of comments
everyone uh defended my my right uh to
be in that Iowa caucus if I choose to do
so so you know I think if people are
going to uh attack me strictly because I
happen to be gay I think that that will
backfire
